articles.title: US Stock Markets Surge to Record Highs on Cooling Inflation and U.S.â€“China Trade Truce
articles.description: On August 12, 2025, U.S. stock markets reached record highs, driven by favorable inflation data and renewed trade stability between the U.S. and China. Major indexes like the Dow Jones Industrial Average, S&P 500, and Nasdaq Composite all closed at or near record levels, reflecting broad-based strength across market sectors.

articles.title: President Trump Orders Federal Takeover of D.C. Police and Deploys National Guard
articles.description: President Donald Trump announced the federalization of Washington, D.C.'s police force and the deployment of 800 National Guard troops to address what he described as 'out-of-control' crime in the capital. This move has sparked controversy, with D.C. Mayor Muriel Bowser expressing concerns over the unprecedented federal intervention.

articles.title: Taylor Swift Announces New Album, 'The Life of a Showgirl'
articles.description: Pop icon Taylor Swift surprised fans with the announcement of her 12th studio album, 'The Life of a Showgirl.' The news was revealed through a midnight countdown on her website, generating excitement among her global fanbase.
